title: DDFP 610: Week 8 Red Challenge Picks & Are you a Wentzylvanian?
itunes:title: DDFP 610: Week 8 Red Challenge Picks & Are you a Wentzylvanian?
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Cynthia Frelund and Matt “Money” Smith to discuss if Halloween is a top holiday and some good costume ideas to wear trick or treating (7:10). Michael Fabiano joins the show to kibitz about the potential greatest upcoming uniform matchup (31:27) and how Philadelphia Eagles QB Carson Wentz has taken the NFL by storm (55:05). Then, EmmaVP reads her Week 8 "TV Guide" horror movie edition previews for the biggest matchups for the group to break down and make their Red Challenge Flag picks (36:55).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
